00042 #include <stdio.h>
00043 #include "mscb.h"

00045 extern bit FREEZE_MODE;
00046 extern bit DEBUG_MODE;
00047 
00048 char code node_name[] = "HVR-300";
00049 
00050 /* declare number of sub-addresses to framework */
00051 unsigned char idata _n_sub_addr = 1;
00052 
00053 /* calculate voltage divider */
00054 #define DIVIDER ((41E6 + 33E3) / 33E3)
00055 
00056 /* current resistor */
00057 #define RCURR 112E3
00058 
00059 /* current multiplier */
00060 #define CUR_MULT 15
00061 
00062 /* configuration jumper */
00063 sbit JU1 = P0 ^ 5;              /* negative module if forced to zero */
00064 sbit JU2 = P0 ^ 1;              /* low current version if forced to zero */
00065 
00066 bit demand_changed, i_limit_changed, ramp_up, ramp_down;
00067 unsigned long demand_changed_time;
00068 float v_actual;
00069 unsigned int i_limit_adc;
00070 
00071 /*---- Define variable parameters returned to CMD_GET_INFO command ----*/
00072 
00073 /* data buffer (mirrored in EEPROM) */
00074 
00075 /* CSR control bits */
00076 #define CONTROL_HV_ON      (1<<0)
00077 #define CONTROL_REGULATION (1<<1)
00078 
00079 /* CSR status bits */
00080 #define STATUS_NEGATIVE    (1<<0)
00081 #define STATUS_LOWCUR      (1<<1)
00082 #define STATUS_RAMP_UP     (1<<2)
00083 #define STATUS_RAMP_DOWN   (1<<3)
00084 #define STATUS_VLIMIT      (1<<4)
00085 #define STATUS_ILIMIT      (1<<5)
00086 
00087 struct {
00088    unsigned char control;
00089    float v_demand;
00090    float v_meas;
00091    float i_meas;
00092    unsigned char status;
00093    unsigned char trip_cnt;
00094 
00095    unsigned int ramp_up;
00096    unsigned int ramp_down;
00097    float v_limit;
00098    float i_limit;
00099    unsigned char trip_max;
00100 
00101    float adc_gain;
00102    float adc_offset;
00103    float dac_gain;
00104    float dac_offset;
00105    float cur_gain;
00106    float cur_offset;
00107 
00108    float temperature;
00109    float v_dac;
00110    unsigned int debug0;
00111    unsigned int debug1;
00112 } idata user_data;
00113 
00114 MSCB_INFO_VAR code variables[] = {
00115    1, UNIT_BYTE, 0, 0, 0, "Control", &user_data.control,        // 0
00116    4, UNIT_VOLT, 0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "Vdemand", &user_data.v_demand,     // 1
00117    4, UNIT_VOLT, 0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "Vmeas", &user_data.v_meas, // 2
00118    4, UNIT_AMPERE, PRFX_MICRO, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "Imeas", &user_data.i_meas,      // 3
00119    1, UNIT_BYTE, 0, 0, 0, "Status", &user_data.status,  // 4
00120    1, UNIT_COUNT, 0, 0, 0, "TripCnt", &user_data.trip_cnt,      // 5
00121 
00122    2, UNIT_VOLT, 0, 0, 0, "RampUp", &user_data.ramp_up, // 6
00123    2, UNIT_VOLT, 0, 0, 0, "RampDown", &user_data.ramp_down,     // 7
00124    4, UNIT_VOLT, 0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "Vlimit", &user_data.v_limit,       // 8

00126    1, UNIT_COUNT, 0, 0, 0, "TripMax", &user_data.trip_max,      // 10
00127

00129    4, UNIT_FACTOR, 0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "ADCgain", &user_data.adc_gain,   // 11

00133    4, UNIT_FACTOR, 0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "CURgain", &user_data.cur_gain,   // 15

00136    /* debugging */
00137    4, UNIT_CELSIUS, 0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "TempC", &user_data.temperature, // 17
00138    4, UNIT_VOLT, 0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "VDAC", &user_data.v_dac,   // 18
00139    2, UNIT_WORD, 0, 0, 0, "Debug0", &user_data.debug0,  // 19
00140    2, UNIT_WORD, 0, 0, 0, "Debug1", &user_data.debug1,  // 20
00141    0

00153 /*---- User init function ------------------------------------------*/
00154 
00155 extern SYS_INFO sys_info;
00156 
00157 void user_init(unsigned char init)
00158 {
00159    /* initial nonzero EEPROM values */
00160    if (init) {
00161       user_data.v_limit = 1200;
00162       user_data.i_limit = 3000;
00163 
00164       user_data.adc_gain = 1;
00165       user_data.adc_offset = 0;
00166       user_data.dac_gain = 1;
00167       user_data.dac_offset = 0;
00168       user_data.cur_gain = 1;
00169       user_data.cur_offset = 0;
00170    }
00171 
00172    /* default control register */
00173    user_data.control = CONTROL_REGULATION;
00174    user_data.status = 0;
00175    JU1 = 1;
00176    JU2 = 1;
00177 
00178    /* enable ADC */
00179    ADCCON1 = 0x7C;              // power up ADC, 14.5us conv+acq time
00180 
00181    /* power up or down DACs */
00182    user_write(0);
00183 
00184    /* force update */
00185    demand_changed = 1;
00186 
00187    /* forc update i_limit_adc */
00188    i_limit_adc = 4096;
00189    i_limit_changed = 1;
00190 }
00191 
00192 /*---- User write function -----------------------------------------*/
00193 
00194 #pragma NOAREGS
00195 
00196 void user_write(unsigned char index) reentrant
00197 {
00198    if (index == 0) {
00199       if (user_data.control & CONTROL_HV_ON) {
00200          /* power up DACs */
00201          DACCON = 0x1F;
00202          v_actual = user_data.v_demand;
00203          dac_write(user_data.v_demand);
00204       } else {
00205          /* power down DACs */
00206          DACCON = 0;
00207       }
00208    }
00209 
00210    if (index == 1 || index == 4) {
00211       /* reset trip */
00212       user_data.status &= ~STATUS_ILIMIT;
00213 
00214       /* indicate new demand voltage */
00215       demand_changed = 1;
00216       demand_changed_time = time();
00217    }
00218 
00219    /* re-check voltage limit */
00220    if (index == 7) {
00221       demand_changed = 1;
00222       demand_changed_time = time();
00223    }
00224 
00225    /* recalculate trip current in ADC units */
00226    if (index == 8)
00227       i_limit_changed = 1;
00228 }
00229 
00230 /*---- User read function ------------------------------------------*/
00231 
00232 unsigned char user_read(unsigned char index)
00233 {
00234    if (index);
00235    return 0;
00236 }
00237 
00238 /*---- User function called vid CMD_USER command -------------------*/
00239 
00240 unsigned char user_func(unsigned char *data_in, unsigned char *data_out)
00241 {
00242    /* echo input data */
00243    data_out[0] = data_in[0];
00244    data_out[1] = data_in[1];
00245    return 2;
00246 }
00247 
00248 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00249 
00250 unsigned int adc_read(unsigned char channel)
00251 {
00252    /* set MUX */
00253    ADCCON2 = (channel & 0x0F);
00254 
00255    DISABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00256 
00257    SCONV = 1;
00258    while (SCONV == 1);
00259 
00260    ENABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00261 
00262    return ADCDATAL + (ADCDATAH & 0x0F) * 256;
00263 }
00264 
00265 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00266 
00267 void dac_write(float value) reentrant
00268 {
00269    unsigned int d;
00270 
00271    /* check for limit */
00272    if (value > user_data.v_limit) {
00273       value = user_data.v_limit;
00274       user_data.status |= STATUS_VLIMIT;
00275    } else
00276       user_data.status &= ~STATUS_VLIMIT;
00277 
00278    /* apply correction */
00279    value = value * user_data.dac_gain + user_data.dac_offset;
00280    if (value < 0)
00281       value = 0;
00282 
00283    /* convert HV to voltage */
00284    value = value / DIVIDER;
00285 
00286    /* convert to DAC units */
00287    value = value / 2.5 * 4096;
00288 
00289    /* output integer part to DAC0 */
00290    d = ((int) value) & 0x0FFF;
00291    //user_data.debug0 = d;
00292 
00293    DAC0H = d >> 8;
00294    DAC0L = d & 0xFF;
00295 
00296    /* output fractional part to DAC1 */
00297    value = value - d;
00298    value *= 56;                 /* assume 10k/560k mixer */
00299 
00300    /* offset by 16 to get out of the rail */
00301    d = (int) (value + 16.5);
00302    //user_data.debug1 = d;
00303 
00304    DAC1H = 0;
00305    DAC1L = d;
00306 }
00307 
00308 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00309 
00310 unsigned char check_current_trip(unsigned int adc)
00311 {
00312    /* read current ADC if not given */
00313    if (adc == 0)
00314       adc = adc_read(0);
00315 
00316    user_data.debug0 = i_limit_adc;
00317    user_data.debug1 = adc;
00318 
00319    if (adc > i_limit_adc) {
00320       /* turn off HV */
00321       DAC0H = 0;
00322       DAC0L = 0;
00323 
00324       /* stop possible ramping */
00325       demand_changed = 0;
00326       v_actual = 0;
00327       user_data.v_dac = 0;
00328       ramp_up = 0;
00329       ramp_down = 0;
00330       user_data.status &= ~(STATUS_RAMP_UP | STATUS_RAMP_DOWN);
00331 
00332       /* raise trip flag */
00333       user_data.status |= STATUS_ILIMIT;
00334       user_data.trip_cnt++;
00335       user_data.v_dac = 0;
00336       v_actual = 0;
00337 
00338       /* check for trip recovery */
00339       if (user_data.trip_cnt < user_data.trip_max) {
00340          /* clear trip */
00341          user_data.status &= ~STATUS_ILIMIT;
00342 
00343          /* force ramp up */
00344          demand_changed = 1;
00345       }
00346 
00347       return 1;
00348    }
00349 
00350    return 0;
00351 }
00352 
00353 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00354 
00355 void read_hv(void)
00356 {
00357    unsigned int i, n;
00358    float hv;
00359    unsigned long v_average;
00360 
00361    n = 10000;
00362 
00363    /* reduced averaging during ramping and after demand change */
00364    if (ramp_up || ramp_down || time() < demand_changed_time + 100)
00365       n = 100;
00366 
00367    v_average = 0;
00368    for (i = 0; i < n;) {
00369       v_average += adc_read(1);
00370       i++;
00371 
00372       if (check_current_trip(0))
00373          break;
00374 
00375       if (demand_changed)
00376          break;
00377 
00378       yield();
00379    }
00380 
00381    /* convert to Volt */
00382    hv = (float) v_average / i / 4096.0 * 2.5;
00383 
00384    /* convert to HV */
00385    hv *= DIVIDER;
00386 
00387    /* apply calibration */
00388    hv = hv * user_data.adc_gain + user_data.adc_offset;
00389 
00390    DISABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00391    user_data.v_meas = hv;
00392    ENABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00393 }
00394 
00395 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00396 
00397 void read_current(void)
00398 {
00399    unsigned int i, adc;
00400    float current;
00401    unsigned long c_average;
00402 
00403    if (i_limit_changed) {
00404       if (user_data.cur_gain > 0)
00405          i_limit_adc =
00406              (user_data.i_limit -
00407               user_data.cur_offset) / user_data.cur_gain / 1E6 * RCURR /
00408              DIVIDER * CUR_MULT / 2.5 * 4096;
00409       i_limit_changed = 0;
00410    }
00411 
00412    c_average = 0;
00413 
00414    /* average 100 readings */
00415    for (i = 0; i < 100; i++) {
00416       adc = adc_read(0);
00417       check_current_trip(adc);
00418 
00419       c_average += adc;
00420 
00421       yield();
00422 
00423       if (demand_changed) {
00424          i++;
00425          break;
00426       }
00427    }
00428 
00429    /* convert to Volt, opamp gain, divider & curr. resist, microamp */
00430    current = (float) c_average / i / 4096.0 * 2.5 / CUR_MULT * DIVIDER / RCURR * 1E6;
00431 
00432    /* calibrate */
00433    current = current * user_data.cur_gain + user_data.cur_offset;
00434 
00435    DISABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00436    user_data.i_meas = current;
00437    ENABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00438 }
00439 
00440 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00441 
00442 void ramp_hv(void)
00443 {
00444    static unsigned long t;
00445    unsigned char delta;
00446 
00447    /* only process ramping when HV is on and not tripped */
00448    if ((user_data.control & CONTROL_HV_ON) && !(user_data.status & STATUS_ILIMIT)) {
00449 
00450       if (demand_changed) {
00451          /* start ramping */
00452 
00453          if (user_data.v_demand > v_actual && user_data.ramp_up > 0) {
00454             /* ramp up */
00455             ramp_up = 1;
00456             ramp_down = 0;
00457             user_data.status |= STATUS_RAMP_UP;
00458             user_data.status &= ~STATUS_RAMP_DOWN;
00459             demand_changed = 0;
00460          }
00461 
00462          if (user_data.v_demand < v_actual && user_data.ramp_down > 0) {
00463             /* ramp down */
00464             ramp_up = 0;
00465             ramp_down = 1;
00466             user_data.status &= ~STATUS_RAMP_UP;
00467             user_data.status |= STATUS_RAMP_DOWN;
00468             demand_changed = 0;
00469          }
00470 
00471          /* remember start time */
00472          t = time();
00473       }
00474 
00475       /* ramp up */
00476       if (ramp_up) {
00477          delta = time() - t;
00478          if (delta) {
00479             v_actual += (float) user_data.ramp_up * delta / 100.0;
00480 
00481             if (v_actual >= user_data.v_demand) {
00482                /* finish ramping */
00483 
00484                v_actual = user_data.v_demand;
00485                user_data.v_dac = v_actual;
00486                ramp_up = 0;
00487                user_data.status &= ~STATUS_RAMP_UP;
00488 
00489                /* make regulation loop faster */
00490                demand_changed_time = time();
00491             }
00492 
00493             dac_write(v_actual);
00494             t = time();
00495          }
00496       }
00497 
00498       /* ramp down */
00499       if (ramp_down) {
00500          delta = time() - t;
00501          if (delta) {
00502             v_actual -= (float) user_data.ramp_down * delta / 100.0;
00503 
00504             if (v_actual <= user_data.v_demand) {
00505                /* finish ramping */
00506 
00507                v_actual = user_data.v_demand;
00508                user_data.v_dac = v_actual;
00509                ramp_down = 0;
00510                user_data.status &= ~STATUS_RAMP_DOWN;
00511 
00512                /* make regulation loop faster */
00513                demand_changed_time = time();
00514             }
00515 
00516             dac_write(v_actual);
00517             t = time();
00518          }
00519       }
00520    }
00521 }
00522 
00523 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00524 
00525 void regulation(void)
00526 {
00527    /* only if HV on and not ramping */
00528    if ((user_data.control & CONTROL_HV_ON) && !ramp_up && !ramp_down &&
00529        !(user_data.status & STATUS_ILIMIT)) {
00530       if (user_data.control & CONTROL_REGULATION) {
00531          /* apply correction if outside +-0.05V window */
00532          if (user_data.v_meas > user_data.v_demand + 0.05 ||
00533              user_data.v_meas < user_data.v_demand - 0.05) {
00534             v_actual = user_data.v_demand;
00535             user_data.v_dac += user_data.v_demand - user_data.v_meas;
00536 
00537             /* only allow +-5V fine regulation range */
00538             if (user_data.v_dac < user_data.v_demand - 5)
00539                user_data.v_dac = user_data.v_demand - 5;
00540 
00541             if (user_data.v_dac > user_data.v_demand + 5)
00542                user_data.v_dac = user_data.v_demand + 5;
00543 
00544             demand_changed = 0;
00545             dac_write(user_data.v_dac);
00546          }
00547       } else {
00548          /* set voltage directly */
00549          if (demand_changed) {
00550             v_actual = user_data.v_demand;
00551             dac_write(v_actual);
00552             demand_changed = 0;
00553          }
00554       }
00555    }
00556 
00557    if (!(user_data.control & CONTROL_HV_ON))
00558       demand_changed = 0;
00559 }
00560 
00561 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00562 
00563 void read_temperature(void)
00564 {
00565    unsigned int i;
00566    float temperature;
00567    unsigned long t_average;
00568 
00569    if (!ramp_up && !ramp_down) {
00570       t_average = 0;
00571       for (i = 0; i < 100; i++) {
00572          t_average += adc_read(8);
00573 
00574          check_current_trip(0);
00575          yield();
00576       }
00577 
00578       /* convert to V */
00579       temperature = (float) t_average / 100 / 4096.0 * 2.5;
00580 
00581       /* convert to deg. C */
00582       temperature = (temperature - 0.6) / -0.003 + 25;
00583 
00584       /* offset measured with prototype */
00585       temperature += 7.0;
00586 
00587       /* strip to 0.1 digits */
00588       temperature = ((int) (temperature * 10 + 0.5)) / 10.0;
00589 
00590       DISABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00591       user_data.temperature = temperature;
00592       ENABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00593 
00594       /* read node configuration */
00595       if (JU1 == 0)
00596          user_data.status |= STATUS_NEGATIVE;
00597       if (JU2 == 0)
00598          user_data.status |= STATUS_LOWCUR;
00599    }
00600 }
00601 
00602 /*---- User loop function ------------------------------------------*/
00603 
00604 void user_loop(void)
00605 {
00606    read_hv();
00607    ramp_hv();
00608    regulation();
00609    read_current();
00610    read_temperature();
00611 }
